channel.title: Make an Item Member's Only to Wear?
channel.description:
How to do this??
I already have the items imported to my game just how to make them member's only
I know what its basically supposed to say
something if playerRights <1 sendMessage(" You must be a member to equip this item")
And i put it in ItemHandler correct?

item.title: Make an Item Member's Only to Wear?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“f1rey wav3, post:8, topic:244269”]Lol, what file?

ItemHandler??[/quote]

Client.java.

Read full topic

item.title: Make an Item Member's Only to Wear?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

In the ‘wear(int wearID, int slot) {’ Boolean, under:

boolean GoFalse = false;

Add this:

if (wearID == #### && playerIsMember < 1) { sendMessage("You need to be a member to equip this item!"); GoFalse = true; }

Read full topic

item.title: Make an Item Member's Only to Wear?
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

Well, I don’t know what your doing but if it was a command then:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("Mypos") && playerRights < 1) { if (premium) { addItem(995, 10000); } else { sendMessage("You need to be premium!"); } }

For first wear, maybe this (Maybe)

Search for this:

 public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) {

To be honest, I don’t know - maybe someone else can help you with that.

Read full topic
